error.title: Layer Organzation
error.description:
## Invalid Organzation
Layers aren't properly organized:
- Layers must all be in ONE group - No groups are allowed in groups
Or you have color problem of your layers, only the following are autorized:
- REF = Green - UTIL = Yellow - BG = Bleue - CH = Red - PNG = Violet
### How to repair?
You can select the default layers with the "Select Layers" button on the right and correct them.
